long_description: The REI Woodland fleece vest offers everyday performance at a great price. Made from a Polartec(R) midweight fleece, it features refined, contemporary styling. Polartec(R) Classic 200 breathable fleece stays warm even when damp, dries fast and has a Durable Water Repellent finish. Rolled collar is soft next to skin; stretch binding at armholes increases comfort. Nice touches include zip hand pockets, interior drop-in mesh pockets and a 1-hand-adjustable drawcord hem. REI Woodland vest has an easy-wearing classic fit. Bluesign(R)-approved materials: information on this environmental and safety standard can be found at REI.com/stewardship. Snaps into an REI Switchback parka and zips into the shell piece of the REI Triad parka , both sold separately.
short_description: The REI Woodland fleece vest offers everyday performance at a great price. Made from a Polartec(R) midweight fleece, it features refined, contemporary styling.
